review: what an amazing journey

loved banner saga 1 and 2 was excited to conclude the trilogy but an absolute buggy hell nevermind polished the cutscenes dont load and greenscreen the battles dont load either and constantly crash genuine unplayable state that is made so much worse by the good will built up with the other two games in the franchise would love to play this once it is fixed but somehow doubt that the devs care

unplayable infuriating crashfest which the devs refuse to fix according to studios comments on forums the game is in a stable state while it clearly isnt  do not buy this crap play the first two and be done with it

this game is a masterpiece its an amazing trilogy an artistic one with a great story and characters i could not recommend it enough i hope in the future to be a continuation of the story with a new trilogy
play the first two and just imagine whatever ending you like as youll never be able to see the actual ending with the game crashing every few loading screens

the story is great the reinforcement mechanic makes combat more interesting and theres a lot more voice acting compared to the first two games  sadly banner saga 3 is missing the polish of the first two games with some ui elements not loading in and the game constantly getting stuck on loading screens resulting in having to redo many fights i even had an invisible sundr in one combat   still recommended though because the trilogy in whole is great

1crashes  infinite loading screen every other battle ruins the game experience 2added rng to the gameplay ruins the strategy  only if you played the previous 2 and want an okay conclusion to your story otherwise just look up playthroughendings videos online play it on easy for your time sake skip gameplay as much as possible

i enjoyed previous games and enjoyed most of this one but last 2 chapters was so frustrating that i simply cannot recomment it  note seems like many people experienced constant game crashes my game crushed only once and it didnt affect my final perception of this game
what a ride

this was a fantastic series that i will almost certainly replay again someday as i can see how there would be a whole bunch of different outcomes in this series based on decisions made in all three games this was a game that for the first time in quite some time made me feel attached to the characters i couldnt recommend this series enough to anyone considering giving it a try
its peak a bit slow tho
constant crashing really sucks i like the story and want to see it concluded but having to replay sections multiple times really drags things out

while banner saga 1 and 2 were great the third game has serious issues and crashes constantly its a known issue that the developers decided not to fix and happens just before and after battles and save points the result is this game is frustrating and you have to repeat battles many times before luck allows you to continue its too bad the developers left the final version in such an awful state
it was all for nothing   one of the greatest video game stories ive had the pleasure of experiencing even if i got the worst ending

the entire saga is very enjoyable i first bought the banner saga 3 and after i finished it i wanted more like it and i bought the other two parts i didnt have any kinds of issues with the game as reported by others
good trilogy ending i wish it was a bit clearer on some time dynamics

the game literally does not function it crashes every time i complete the third fight of the game steam refuses to process my refund as ive played for more than two hours trying to get it to work its a shame because the story is actually good
honestly i didnt expect much but how wrong i was what a game the mass effect of the strategy rpgs in the way that a lot of your decisions impact the story great game
that last episode is honestly the 1 too much repetitive quite confusing dragging in length i like the first 2 but i give up before finishing this one
a beautiful and captivating game

whether it is a storybook or a game is up for debate however what is not is that this is an innovative and enjoyable saga choices matter and the story is engaging and different  the entire saga is one i wish i could find the time to play again if only i could stop buying games
obviously if you played the previous games youll want to see the ending as of 2025 there are a lot of crashes and infinite loading screens
my favourite game and franchise of all time epic scale story music and im 11k elo in aoe2de so i know a good game
third one and still damn brilliant gaming play these

i love this series as a whole and although i found the ending to be amazing it left me slightly wanting maybe it was the choices i made or how it all just played out for me idk wonderful game still 1010
list ubspecial in their own waybu among the best a lot very much liked it it was cool finished it had enough fun to give it a like though i tried list
youll need to play 1  2  i came here for the ending and was rewarded  very accessible and fun tactics game

i saw a lot of people complain about crashes i only had one crash pretty much at the very start and by pure luck or randomness i deactivated fullscreen and never had a single crash again   id hope the devs would fix this issue but doesnt seem likely after so many years lol anyway i hope if anyone is having the same issue this can help them
the game keeps crashing after a certain fight in chapter 21 so i literally cant continue playing the game ive done the fight 4 times now and it keeps crashing every single time
amazing story and art that transports you to another world loved the decision trees and battle strategies

the other reviews commenting on the instability are correct  it will freeze up when loading new scenes or battles and its very frustrating but if youve made it to episode 3 i suspect youre going to want to see it through and its worth it the climax does not disappoint
all the banner sagas are great though 3 gets sloggy towards the end and 1 does not yet offer much
pretty cool srpg if you play all 3 games in a row

sparr is a fkn madlad i kid you not i havent genuinely laughed like this in a long time  other than that what a masterpiece this trilogy has been  awesome visuals rich story satisfying combat hard choices and consequences  mindblowingly unique game     this 3rd game was fkn epic fear conflicting feelings unbelievable
damn  just  god damn
do not purchase this game past the 10 hour mark game becomes unplayable due to crashing loading and autosave issues   do not purchase this game
couldnt even make it through a single chapter before the game frozecrashed on me
the entire trilogy is a pure gem the gameplay and the narrative are equally amazing all throughout the story give it the try it deserves this ones a classic in this genre

the game constantly freezes the problem is common just look at the latest reviews on steam  i enjoyed the first two parts but the third part is pointless to buy you will not be able to complete it because of the bugs
beautiful art do not buy constant crashes we are talking about crash city crash fest and crash galore

probably the best trilogy game that ive ever played gorgeous art fantastic music and challenging gameplay will take you through the amazing world of banner saga that changes depending on the choices youve made one small con is that theres no voice acting but then again the dialogues are easily readable
darkness cannot prevail forever

not a bad game but the weakest of the 3 episodes still of course anyone enjoying the series will play the conclusion however i cant leave a positive review to such a bugged game that the devs didnt care to fix its disrespectful for players and fans
good conclusion
gotta complete the saga bby

what a frustrating technical mess banner saga  1  2 never crashed this one is like a 5050 coin toss in every post battle screen verifying integrity reinstalling running in windows 7 compatibility mode none of those matter

crashes all the time  the forums and discord are full of others saying the same thing but their is no solution  disappointing as i played and enjoyed the first two but after multiple attempts to fix it and two reinstallations ive given up
cons buggy and crashy for a 16hr game  pros as per the other games amazing art and great story
please play this series from the start to the end
t  t part 3 is so dark you feel despair every step of the way  but thats a compliment to the developers and their story building
this really is a saga i dont usually reply story intensive games but i might give this trilogy a couple more runs
amazing series with agonizing choices and good tactical gameplay
good game but keeps crashing so i cant finish it

third verse same as the rest  i left most of what i had to say on my review for the first game so if you want more of that then thats what you get  beautiful animation fantastic story even got a pretty strong emotional reaction out of me and im not usually the type to get emotional like that over anything let alone games  if you like strategy games and like a good story then check it out i doubt youll regret it

i really didnt have any issues with the first two games when it came to crashes but i can expect them every 23 battles sometimes less in this installment ive had to redo battles which sucks and the survival mode counts crashes as you quitting the game using up your limited attempts   this game desperately needs a patch or something but its going on 6 years old so

great story and a lot of main characters diecan die however the endings only matter by the last battle and conversation you can easily obtain 23 endings if you have defeatedlost against the last battle it sucks theres no save states but thats kind of bs to me however i still recommend for the immersion and grrm storytelling as always the combat system is more annoying than fun  a bit buggy but you can get through it by restarting or repairing

this is one of the best games ive played ive agonized over decisions mourned characters celebrated successes in this game more than in most the third chapter is great but a bit buggy compared to the first two worth playing though

if youve reached banner saga 3 youve most likely played through 1 and 2 already and know what to expect from the gameplay art story and music in most parts banner saga 3 is just more of what came before but for this game they have gone all out on the animations and storytelling making your choices matter more than ever before in impacting the story elevating it higher then ever before  truly a grand finale worthy of the series
beautiful game i played banner saga 1  2 on my phone playing banner saga 3 on pc is the perfect ending for me

good series  im pushing through but as many others also indicate with how often this game crashes i cant recommend it  edit  it now crashes after the same battles multiple times cant progress judging by the other reviews the developers have abandoned the playerbase as far as trying to respond or fix this
i had a blast with this whole series
id highly recommend them if your looking for a good story based game i think they stuck the landing masterfully
yay

great roleplaying game 910   great sequel  great visual style  great soundtrack  great storyline  decisions made determine how the story continues  unexpected storyline twists  welldeveloped characters  great gameplay  good turnbased combat  interesting quests and different ways to solve them  good mix of game genres roleplaying game turnbased strategy adventure   game crashes  an outstanding saga
one of the best trilogies i have ever played
just having finished the trilogy for the second time i stillagain really wish for more of the banner saga  dear devs get to work on it already please
love playing this while drinking coffee in the morning
love this series  however this game has big crashing problems that seemingly will never be fixed

i love the banner saga 12 but banner saga 3 is a broken game full with crash that developer already drop out and will never fix it you can not finish the game and will never get to saw ending yourself
great game lovely story but too many near gameplaybreaking crashes that werent prevalent in the other sagas
beautiful emotional and challenging

it should be pointed out that this is part 3 of the banner game rather than a separate or true sequel to the previous 2 i did feel this was probably the weakest of the 3 parts but it still does bring the story to a satisfactory end if you played the previous 2 parts and enjoyed them then you should absolutely play part 3 as well
a great conclusion of the trilogy it is absolutely necessary to play all 3 games in the right order

great ending to the story with room to grow however the writing progression elements and combat did not feel as substantial as the prior games in its entirety the banner saga its story setting and characters has been a masterpiece if it were a tv series it would easily rival game of thrones highly recommended for the story driven
man i loved bs1 and 2 but 3 isnt very good   nonsensical story mindless combat and a dramatic misuse of good characters   by the end i was just so bored
my last review on this excellent series this has been a journey and is one of my favourite sagas in gaming if these games interest you please play them they are excellent
its just like the first two games so if you enjoyed those youll probably like this

i enjoyed the saga quite a lot yes 3 didnt capture the same magic as 1 did but considering this is the 3rd in a trilogy it did well to expand on the lore and answer a fair few questions  i would have liked to have seen more closure at the end maybe single panel images telling us the consequences of our decisions  otherwise a good game and end to the saga   you will not regret buying this on sale if youve played the other two

an amazing sendoff to the banner saga series every choice you have made in previous games will matter im very satisfied with the ending and while there is still much mystery around certain things in the game i guess thats the whole point
up
crashes constantly you spend 30 minutes in a fight only to have it crash after you barely scrape by a win it absolutely ruins the story and world the other 2 games built so well
love the story  art and combat third one is special cause it feats the eternal arena  custom battles and weekly chalenge if you are into turnbased strategy mastering
great ending to a great trilogy cant wait for stoics next project
excellent but buggy
100 this is the best game in the trilogy  it really does feel like the return of the king equivalent of the banner saga world  a beautiful ending to a skillfully woven saga
kinda strange that in the late game i am encouraged to not finish the game to see more content

they outdone themselves in the first and second i have over 100 hours of playtime in the first game and even more in the second with the introduction of survival mode this one was one and done the ending was uninspiring and lazy and the combat and gameplay are worse than the second game its been a blast playing this amazing trilogy but the ending and boring gameplay in this one left me bitter

the buggiest game in the series i love the many consequences you get from the previous parts but not a fan of new wave mechanics some characters get introduced so late that you dont have enough battles to use them in many items have such high level requirements theyre practically useless in the previous games you kinda collected them for the future but here it lacks any meaning

45 compared to 1 and 2 i found 3 quite disappointing  too much  based abilities consequences that feel random at times and the story was not as interesting  the ending felt anticlimatic  its still a great game but i can only recommend it because of 1 and 2
all of my chickens came home to roost all my sweet little chickens died in the cold night 810
excellent final part to the trilogy
ggwp
holds up super well  love it

solid tactical combat system solid story with good characterization compelling conflict interesting twists in the plot beautiful art symphonic soundtrack i guess you could nitpick and find flaws and frustrations with the game but overall it hits on all the best of what a turnbased fantasy strategy game is supposed to be
a buggy mess

some of the best story telling you can get from a game series the strategy can be challenging but also easy your choice reflect heavily in this series which makes the game feel alive and completely immerses you into carrying about characters and trying to keep alive the party you make 100 recommend to any trpg player
what is wrong with the critics lately postcovid world stupidity
the end of a beautiful and incredibly written game

the first 2 games of the series are great but part 3 is highly unstable  i have had to play so many sections 3 times because the game crashes or fails to load the next area so often  a very disappointing end to a really fun series
very good

i felt like the quality of this installment did not reach that of banner saga 2  there was less content less interesting character development no major gameplay improvements like between the first and second and some features that came with the second installment had to be purchased separately in this one

i like that its a complete story  sometimes i feel like clicking through but then sometimes i regret skipping text  i like the combat style because it lets me walk away at times like a chess board  be careful because this is setting dependent  but thats why i play this i can leave it on and walk away  other games you cant do that

i am a huge fan of this series and it is possibly one of the best turn based games to exit imho but 3 keeps crashing for some reason  i have never had an issue with 1 or 2 if youre picking this up and it crashes for you get the mod from nexus mods called nafeijs bs3 fixpack bless this person for making this playable i can finally finish the saga
love it bought them for playstation originally and had to buy them again here when i saw they were on sale i recommend buying them full price as well

this series really lost what it once was the original game was astounding the pvp which existed then was incredible almost like battle chess  it dissolved into a story with so many characters and such pointless choices and battles that is a real shame   worth the price on sale otherwise no
fun
the only problem is my computer going crazy when in caracter stats screen its so weird i like to think and take my time but im afraid computer will overheat in stats screen

this entire series is insane  the story is long and rich full of rich characters brave and cowards honest and treacherous  the banner saga3 introduces even more mechanics and units as in battles and in macrogaming the final chapters are just incredible in everything aforementioned
i love this series i cant complete my 3 game journey because the battle my save is locked into crashes every time i complete it ive tried five times including with cloud save disabled

i love this trilogy good writing cool characters and an amazing world and story   i highly recommend this series not just for turn based fans if you love fantasy worlds andor nordic settings check out this series
fairly nice
a befitting ending to an amazing trilogy the story is top notch but i still believe the game play in my opinion at least is boring

this trilogy is quite unique the art music and world building are excellent it tells a very moving story that somewhat reminded me of mass effect the gameplay is fine however the ux make the experience sometimes tedious requiring some trials and error to learn what everything does as the game doesnt explain it very well during combat the french localisation was kind of bad unfortunately as well
shut up and just buy it right now have a calm and deep experience well crafted for thinkers enjoying a romantic hour
1010  another great game in the series gg take my money
great game and visuals
great ending to a great series my only complaint is that you had so few chances to rest and as such the game became very difficult
the epic conclusion to banner saga a wonderful well done turn based rpg
loved the first 2 games but this one just feels tedious lazy and unsatisfying

its a fine story with good art and a tedious  boring combat system that thinks difficulty is about forcing poor team composition  watch it on youtube for a much better experience then playing through this slog of a game
amazing story good gameplay buggy as sht
the game is good but lots of bugs like tom many times it just kick me out of the game

phenomenal absolutely beautiful story got me with a heavy heart throughout the entirety of it one thing after another of storytelling with loads of depth this has become my favorite game after a loss of a character i wont spoil anything but man i didnt want the game to end i felt that this game is worth picking up the trilogy without a doubt be prepared for all the feels
if you love games and storytelling you owe it to yourself to experience the banner saga

this one had the time to get into more of the story and the character backgrounds which was nice  cool additions like heroic titles new characters and abilities  multiple endings which reference some story decisions from throughout the three games if youve used your old save files  its a shame that some characters and titles are shut behind preorder or kickstarter stuff and the mode that was free in bs2 is now a paid dlc otherwise a nice ending to the saga
the staggering conclusion to this beautiful series the ending was so intense and great  if you liked the other two find out what happens to your dudes in the season finale
such a cool series
